ygData.subject: Re: Lute of the Gypsy Princess *SPOILER*
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/15/99 8:19:22 PM Eastern Daylight Time, kim@stormhaven.org writes: I m putting a  mini SPOILER SPACE, don t want to spoil people.  but
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/15/99 8:19:22 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
kim@... writes:
I'm putting a mini SPOILER SPACE, don't want to spoil people. but hitting
return too much hurts my fingers and wears me out...hehe













<< Lord Grimlot tells you about his
poor, misguided beloved Arlena, >>

Where is Lord Grimlot from? , never heard of or seen him before. and i think
i've been around a bit, sorta.



"Put the enchanted electrum bar +
hilt into the mold and hit combine to make the wakizashi, "


where do you get enchanted electrum bar ? is it exspensive ?
and eventhough you're quoting this so you might not know. What if you don't
have a good smithing skill. does that matter whether or not the blade will
come out?


Ulaien Firesong
lvl 32 ( mana song made things less fun then more fun )
bard of tunare .
And no , i don't have the lute , and prolly won't for a good while (
tho ya never know) but the questions popped in my head and so they must be
asked ! hehe....
